metadata.title: USN-3448-1 -- OpenStack Keystone vulnerability
metadata.description: Boris Bobrov discovered that OpenStack Keystone incorrectly handled federation mapping when there are rules in which group-based assignments are not used. A remote authenticated user may receive all the roles assigned to a project regardless of the federation mapping, contrary to expectations.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3448-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  keystone-doc - 2:9.3.0-0ubuntu3.1 keystone - 2:9.3.0-0ubuntu3.1 python-keystone - 2:9.3.0-0ubuntu3.1 No subscription required
